Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan Dried Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Vancomycin
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of gram-positive bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Dried Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Vancomycin for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of gram-positive bacteria
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive bacteria, including vancomycin susceptibility testing for enterococci and staphylococci.
